EmailTemplate.name: Renewal Won 5 @ +14 Days: Action Required
EmailTemplate.subject: Important | Your payment is 14 days overdue
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Attention: Action Required
Dear {!Opportunity.Primary_Subscription_Contact__c},
We have not received payment of {!Opportunity.Amount} for your subscription to Compliance Week, and your invoice is 14 days past due. To reactivate your account, please make arrangements as soon as possible.
Angela Ruggiero Business Development Associate (617) 570-8608
Subscription Details Online Mail Order / Check Call
Type: {!Opportunity.Single_Multi__c}-User Term: {!Opportunity.Subscription_Starts__c}-{!Opportunity.Subscription_Expires__c} Amount: {!Opportunity.Amount} Invoice: {!Opportunity.Invoice__c}
Accounts Payable 129 Portland St Fl 6 Boston MA 02114-2014 (617) 570-8608
